snippet: A court sentenced a Spanish man to four years in prison for his role as the driver in a car crash that killed the dissident Oswaldo Payá, the authorities announced Monday.
lead_paragraph: A court sentenced a Spanish man to four years in prison for his role as the driver in a car crash that killed the dissident Oswaldo Payá, the authorities announced Monday.

headline.main: Cuba: Spaniard Guilty in Crash That Killed Dissidents
